name: Template Manager
description: Create, export, import, and reuse Proxmox LXC/VM templates. Includes guided cleanup for LXC exports, template naming, compressed tarball export, import from file/URL, and optional creation of new CT/VMs from imported templates.

notes.text: Run this tool on the Proxmox host as root.
LXC export can remove net0 and sanitize the container; ensure you understand the cleanup steps before proceeding.
Imported .tar.gz files are placed into CT Templates storage so they appear in the Proxmox GUI.
